name: McCarthy High
description:
Where has the The McCarthy High Spirit gone?! A combination of suspected vandalism, higher bullying rates and low attendance to the schools football games has meant Mr. Hoover is now trying to find who/what is responsible. Gather evidence, talk to other students and present your theory to discover what happened.

CREDITS:
Byron Crowhurst - Writer
Emma Escott - UI Artist/Writer
Serena Turtle - Background Artist
Nick Furniss - Programmer
Wren Kuah - Character Artist
